//: All of these turrets uses their health as ammunition.
description: SDP-L1, also known as Secronom Defense Project Type "Laser", is an advanced laser turret based from the miniature TX-5LR Cerberus. Its autonomous laser cannon fires a concentrated beam of pure heat that pierces through targets. It uses a modified storage battery that allows the turret to operate on its own.

special_attacks.monster_message: <color_yellow>%1$s shoots a ray of heat at %3$s!</color>
